001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import org.openqa.selenium.By;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a UI button component with various ways to locate and interact
008 * with buttons in a web interface.
009 *
010 * <p>Provides methods for clicking a button by text label, container reference,
011 * or locator, as well as checking if the button is enabled or visible.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015public interface Button {
016
017   /**
018    * Clicks a button identified by text, within a given container.
019    *
020    * @param container  The container holding the button.
021    * @param buttonText The text label of the button to click.
022    */
023   void click(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
024
025   /**
026    * Clicks a button within the given container, selecting the first or only
027    * button found in that container.
028    *
029    * @param container The container holding the button.
030    */
031   void click(SmartWebElement container);
032
033   /**
034    * Clicks a button identified by its text label, at the top level (no container).
035    *
036    * @param buttonText The text label of the button to click.
037    */
038   void click(String buttonText);
039
040   /**
041    * Clicks a button identified by a specific locator.
042    *
043    * @param buttonLocator A {@link By} locator for the button element.
044    */
045   void click(By buttonLocator);
046
047   /**
048    * Checks if a button (by text) inside the specified container is enabled.
049    *
050    * @param container  The container holding the button.
051    * @param buttonText The text label of the button.
052    * @return {@code true} if the button is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
053    */
054   boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
055
056   /**
057    * Checks if the only or first button inside the specified container is enabled.
058    *
059    * @param container The container holding the button.
060    * @return {@code true} if the button is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
061    */
062   boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container);
063
064   /**
065    * Checks if a button identified by text is enabled at the top level (no container).
066    *
067    * @param buttonText The text label of the button.
068    * @return {@code true} if the button is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
069    */
070   boolean isEnabled(String buttonText);
071
072   /**
073    * Checks if a button identified by a locator is enabled.
074    *
075    * @param buttonLocator A {@link By} locator for the button element.
076    * @return {@code true} if the button is enabled; {@code false} otherwise.
077    */
078   boolean isEnabled(By buttonLocator);
079
080   /**
081    * Checks if a button (by text) inside the specified container is visible on the page.
082    *
083    * @param container  The container holding the button.
084    * @param buttonText The text label of the button.
085    * @return {@code true} if the button is visible; {@code false} otherwise.
086    */
087   boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
088
089   /**
090    * Checks if the only or first button inside the specified container is visible on the page.
091    *
092    * @param container The container holding the button.
093    * @return {@code true} if the button is visible; {@code false} otherwise.
094    */
095   boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container);
096
097   /**
098    * Checks if a button identified by text is visible at the top level (no container).
099    *
100    * @param buttonText The text label of the button.
101    * @return {@code true} if the button is visible; {@code false} otherwise.
102    */
103   boolean isVisible(String buttonText);
104
105   /**
106    * Checks if a button identified by a locator is visible.
107    *
108    * @param buttonLocator A {@link By} locator for the button element.
109    * @return {@code true} if the button is visible; {@code false} otherwise.
110    */
111   boolean isVisible(By buttonLocator);
112
113   /**
114    * Optionally clicks an element within a table cell or container; default no-op.
115    *
116    * <p>Overridden by implementations if cell-level actions for buttons are required.
117    *
118    * @param cell The cell element that may contain a button.
119    */
120   default void clickElementInCell(SmartWebElement cell) {
121   }
122}
